sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"照料，培育"之意。
means: nurse ： 通常指对无力自顾的婴儿、病人等进行照料或护理。
tend ： 指出于责任心、博爱心而不是私人感情去对人或物进行照顾。
foster ： 指对孩子的关心、鼓励、供养及抚养其成长；也指鼓励、促进事物的增长与发展。
cultivate ： 具体意义指耕耘、培育植物；抽象意义指培养兴趣或向往的理想事物。

sentence.Network_en: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

sentence.Network_en: We should cultivate the good habits of diligence and frugality.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要养成勤俭节约的好风气.

sentence.Network_en: He always tries to cultivate rich and famous people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是试图结交有钱有势的人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin cultivat- 'prepared for crops', from the verb cultivare, from cultiva (terra) 'arable (land'), from colere 'cultivate, inhabit'

entry.def: If you cultivate land or crops, you prepare land and grow crops on it.

example.ex: She also cultivated a small garden of her own.
example.tran: 她还耕种了一片属于自己的小园子。
为数不多的几小块耕地

entry.tran: 逐渐形成，培养(某种态度、形象或技能)
entry.def: If you cultivate an attitude, image, or skill, you try hard to develop it and make it stronger or better.

example.ex: He has written eight books and has cultivated the image of an elder statesman...
example.tran: 他已经写了8本书，树立起了其政界元老的形象。

example.ex: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
example.tran: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

entry.def: If you cultivate someone or cultivate a friendship with them, you try hard to develop a friendship with them.

example.ex: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General...
example.tran: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

example.ex: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
example.tran: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

means.word_mean: 3. train to be discriminative in taste or judgment;
4. adapt (a wild plant or unclaimed land) to the environment;

auth_sentence.content: But they have no field to cultivate food.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they have no field to cultivate food.

stems_affixes.word_buile: arboriculture[[n.树木的培植]]男→adj.培植树木的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有开垦的, 没有耕种的, 没有教养的

stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向内+cult教派→在教派内不让别人知道
agri农业+culture培养,文化→引申为养殖业→农业
aqui水+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.[生物]水产养殖
arbori=arbor+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.树木的培植
cult耕种,培养→培养[感情]→崇拜,引申为教派
cultivate[v.耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼]+ion动作或状态→n.耕作,培养

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育
stems_affixes.word_buile: cult耕种,培养+ure表名词→培养出的[东西]→人类文化
flori=flor花+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.花艺, 栽培花卉
pisci鱼+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.养鱼学, 养鱼业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼
stems_affixes.word_buile: cult耕种,培养+ivate表动词→v.耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼

Sentence.sentence: Many societies throughout history and around the world today have cultivated strong pressures to stay married.

The closeness this system cultivates is reinforced by the institution of "advisory" classes Teachers meet with students in groups of 25, five mornings a week, for open-ended discussions of everything from homework problems to bad Saturday-night dates.
help to cultivate masculine aggressiveness in boys
Humanistic thinking helps cultivate students' creativity.

sentences.en: The farmer is cultivating his land.
This field has not been cultivated for years.
sentences.cn: 这片土地已荒废多年了。

sentences.en: She cultivated her mind by reading many books.
sentences.cn: 她博览群书, 修身养性。

sentences.en: One should cultivate good manners from childhood.
sentences.cn: 一个人从小要学讲礼貌。

means.word_mean: 建立(友谊)；结交（朋友）；获得（支持）

sentences.en: He purposedly tried to cultivate good relations with the press.
sentences.cn: 他特意设法与新闻界搞好关系。

sentences.en: It helps if you go out of your way to cultivate the local people.
sentences.cn: 如果你不怕麻烦主动结交当地人，会大有好处。

sentences.en: The people cultivate mainly rice and beans.
sentences.cn: 这里的人们主要种植稻子和豆类。

means.word_mean: 逐渐形成（某种态度、谈话或举止方式等）

sentences.en: She tried to cultivate an air of sophistication.
sentences.cn: 她竭力养成一种老于世故的气派。

jushi.english: She cultivated her mind by reading many books.
Pearls are being cultivated on the South China Sea coast.
jushi.chinese: 南海沿岸在进行珍珠人工养殖。

jushi.english: One should cultivate good manners from childhood.
jushi.chinese: 一个人从小要学讲礼貌。
